0.1.name: wordpress/vimcolor
0.1.description: The vimcolor module highlights code in many different formats. VIM is a common programmers text editor for (usually) unix based systems. Out of the box VIM can color the syntax of 200+ languages including PHP, Perl, C, HTML, Fortran, Haskell, Java, etc. This plugin is a PURE piracy from Drupal vimcolor module. Only the last two lines belong to me. :-
